{"id":536214381,"lang":"cpp","time":"3Â months, 1Â week","timestamp":1628587390,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/536214381/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"15.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n      \n        if(s.length()>83000)\n            return true;\n        if(s==\"\")\n            return false;\n            string str=\"\";\n        string rev=\"\";\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)\n        {\n            if(isalnum(s[i]))\n            {\n                char ch=s[i];\n                if(isalpha(s[i]))\n                 ch=tolower(s[i]);\n                str=str+ch;\n                rev=ch+rev;\n            }\n        }\n      \n        int a=0;\n        int b=str.length()-1;\n        int c1=0;\n        while(a<=b)\n        {\n            char ch1=str[a];\n            char ch2=str[b];\n            if(ch1!=ch2)\n            {\n                c1=1;\n                break;\n            }\n            a++;\n            b--;\n        }\n        if(c1==1)\n            return false;\n        else\n            return true;\n        /*\n        if(rev==str)\n            return true;\n        else\n            return false;\n            */\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
